post_text: November 14, 2017 at 2:34 AM#1Hello all,I've been working on getting the knobs of the APC40 to play nice with the encoders. I've got it about 90% functional, and I wanted to share my progress and possibly illicit some help if possible.Task: Map Encoder wheels to knobs of APC 40Using [url=http://www.ma-share.net/forum/read.php…30983#msg-30983]Pichi's Midicon macros[/url] I was able to get input to the encoder values.Then using some rules in bome I was able to get the knobs to react like continuous encoders (see code below)Codegd=pp-gaga=ppif gd==0 then Goto "Check"if gd>0 then Goto "Up"if gd<0 then Goto "Down"Label "Check"if pp==127 then Goto "Up"if pp==0 then Goto "Down"Label "Up"qq=65rr=12exit rules, execute Outgoing ActionLabel "Down"qq=63rr=11exit rules, execute Outgoing ActionDisplay MoreThe only issue I'm having now is that the align function resets to off as soon as I touch the encoder.Would anyone be able to shed some light on this?
title: APC40 Rotary Encoders
